item.title: Graphic Design Basics
item.description: Designers Ellen Lupton and Jennifer Cole Phillips, authors of the book Graphic Design, The New Basics  and Directors of the MFA Program at Maryland Institute College of Art offer a free 35 minute Skillshare course walking through 5 basic principles of graphic design. The course is a quick primer on design principles suited to various visual design projects.
